titles.title: Military Retiree Dislocation Assistance Act

To amend title 37, United States Code, to provide a dislocation allowance under section 407 of such title to retired members of the uniformed services and members on the temporary disability retired list moving from their last duty station to their designated home.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 6/13/2002--Introduced. Military Retiree Dislocation Assistance Act - Authorizes the payment of a primary dislocation allowance for a member of the armed forces who is retired, or placed on a temporary disability retired list, and whose dependents actually move from the member's last duty station to a home selected by the member.
